SuperPart_Gong_1_1.Desc: An entry-level secret body that is popular among physical cultivators, easy to achieve with well-balanced components and considerable development potential.
SuperPart_Gong_1_1.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_1

Levels.Title: First Layer
Levels.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body performance.

Levels.Title: Second Layer
Levels.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body attack accuracy.

Levels.Title: Third Layer
Levels.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a small amount.

Levels.Title: Fourth Layer
Levels.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body's artifact suppression chance.

Levels.Title: Fifth Layer
Levels.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a moderate amount.

SuperPart_Gong_1_2.Desc: Uses both arms as the core and waist as the axis, merging the three Yin elements Metal, Water and Moon in the left arm and the three Yang elements Wood, Fire and Sun in the right arm, and combines them into one. Excels at suppressing the enemy's artifact.
SuperPart_Gong_1_2.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_2

Levels.Title: First Layer
Levels.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body's artifact suppression chance.

SuperPart_Gong_1_3.Desc: Uses the energy of the Five Elements within the organs to drive both fists and attacks with five different forms. Excels at attacking the Qi barrier's weak point.
SuperPart_Gong_1_3.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_3

Levels.Title: First Layer
Levels.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.

Levels.Title: Second Layer
Levels.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.

Levels.Title: Third Layer
Levels.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.

SuperPart_Gong_1_4.Desc: The most advanced secret skill in Primordial Unity Body. Refines the back muscle to the extreme so that it resembles an eagle's wings. Refines the shoulders to the extreme so that it resembles a bear's torso. Wields power from the waist and sternum, works the spine like a dragon and fends off all attackers with both shoulders.
SuperPart_Gong_1_4.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_4

Levels.Title: First Layer
Levels.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a large amount.\n Drastically increases the secret body attack accuracy.\n Drastically increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.

SuperPart_Gong_1_5.Desc: Uses extreme Yang energy to remold the heart to drastically increase the physical cultivator's power.
SuperPart_Gong_1_5.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_5

Levels.Title: First Layer
Levels.Desc: Moderately increases the physical cultivator's remold rate.

Levels.Title: Second Layer
Levels.Desc: Drastically increases the ability improvement rate during the physical cultivator's furious berserk.

SuperPart_Gong_1_6.Desc: Uses extreme Yin energy to remold the heart to drastically increase the physical cultivator's blessing.
SuperPart_Gong_1_6.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_6

Levels.Title: First Layer
Levels.Desc: Moderately increases the physical cultivator's dodge rate.

Levels.Title: Second Layer
Levels.Desc: Drastically reduces the physical cultivator's True Qi consumption rate of artifact suppression.

SuperPart_Gong_1_7.Desc: Imitates the dragon and uses the head, spine and pelvis as the core to connect all the bones so that the whole body is controlled by spine movement. Effectively increases the body's attack ability.
SuperPart_Gong_1_7.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_7

Levels.Title: First Layer
Levels.Desc: Increases the physical cultivator's secret body power by 5%.

Levels.Title: Second Layer
Levels.Desc: Increases the physical cultivator's secret body power by 5%.

Levels.Title: Third Layer
Levels.Desc: Increases the physical cultivator's secret body power by 5%.

SuperPart_Gong_1_8.Desc: A secret body training method created following the dragon copulation theory for essence shaping used by cultivators with a Golden Core. Draws energy from heart and kidneys with techniques and converges them in the stomach, which is used as a furnace to drastically increase the food consumption and stamina generation. Practice it to the extreme to learn Whale Breathing that can quickly generate essence from nothing.
SuperPart_Gong_1_8.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_8

Levels.Title: First Layer
Levels.Desc: Moderately increases the physical cultivator's food consumption bonus.\n Moderately increases the physical cultivator's stamina replenishment bonus.\n Slightly increases the physical cultivator's appetite.

Levels.Title: Second Layer
Levels.Desc: Moderately increases the essence acquisition rate from devouring items.\n Moderately increases the amount of essence gained from devouring items.\n Moderately increases the physical cultivator's appetite.

Levels.Title: Third Layer
Levels.Desc: Drastically increases the physical cultivator's food consumption bonus.\n Drastically increases the physical cultivator's stamina replenishment bonus.\n Drastically increases the physical cultivator's appetite.

Levels.Title: Fourth Layer
Levels.Desc: Drastically increases the essence acquisition rate from devouring items.\n Drastically increases the amount of essence gained from devouring items.\n Increases the physical cultivator's appetite by a huge amount.

Levels.Title: Fifth Layer
Levels.Desc: Unlock Miracle: Whale Breathing

SuperPart_Gong_1_9.Desc: An entry-level secret body for physical cultivators, easy to achieve by remolding both legs with Wood energy and spreading roots into the ground as Wood is counteractive with Earth. Using this secret body resembles a deep-rooted old tree that is unmovable.
SuperPart_Gong_1_9.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_9
